issue.title: [CF 688] Attempt to get length of field 'CSN' (a nil value)
issue.body:
When logging on my rogue and only my rogue this error pops up.  All the TMW icons are invisible at this point until I type /tmw, at which point they become active (as they should have been from the start), note that they are locked, not in config mode as typing /tmw normally would do.

Date: 2012-11-09 06:36:26
ID: 1
Error occured in: Global
Count: 1
Message: ..\AddOns\TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua line 2333:
   attempt to get length of field 'CSN' (a nil value)
Debug:

   TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:2737: DoUpgrade()

comments.body:

r653 fixed it, thanks!
